channel.title: CVE Feed for cbutlerjr -- WP-Members Membership Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for cbutlerjr -- WP-Members Membership Plugin

item.title: CVE-2024-9231|2024-10-22T09:32:09.502Z -- cbutlerjr -- wp-members%20membership%20plugin
item.description: The WP-Members Membership Plugin plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting due to the use of add_query_arg without appropriate escaping on the URL in all versions up to, and including, 3.4.9.5. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that execute if they can successfully trick a user into performing an action such as clicking on a link.

item.title: CVE-2024-2920|2024-08-01T19:25:42.159Z -- cbutlerjr -- wp-members%20membership%20plugin
item.description: The WP-Members Membership Plugin plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Information Exposure in all versions up to, and including, 3.4.9.3 due to the plugin uploading user supplied files to a publicly accessible directory in wp-content without any restrictions. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to view files uploaded by other users which may contain sensitive information.

item.title: CVE-2024-2920|2024-06-04T17:29:59.364Z -- cbutlerjr -- wp-members%20membership%20plugin
item.description: The WP-Members Membership Plugin plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Information Exposure in all versions up to, and including, 3.4.9.3 due to the plugin uploading user supplied files to a publicly accessible directory in wp-content without any restrictions. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to view files uploaded by other users which may contain sensitive information.
